DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the recommended dose of NC-6004 according to the dose-limiting toxicity (DLT) in combination with Gemcitabine, and to assess the efficacy, safety and tolerability.
DOC.brief_title: NC-6004(Nanoplatin) and Gemcitabine to Treat Pancreatic Cancer in Asia
DOC.criteria: Patients with chemonaive, advanced pancreatic cancer Nonresectable, histologically or cytologically confirmed, locally advanced or metastatic pancreatic cancer Pulmonary fibrosis or interstitial pneumonia Marked pleural effusion or ascites above Grade 2 Severe drug hypersensitivity Metastasis to the central nervous system and brain
